metadata.name: rumble_engine
metadata.description: Rumble engine: betting, combat, and payouts for Underground Claw Fights

instructions.name: accept_admin
docs: Accept a pending admin transfer. Must be signed by the proposed admin.

accounts.name: new_admin
docs: The proposed new admin must sign this transaction.

instructions.name: admin_set_result
docs: Admin override to set rumble result directly.
Bypasses combat state machine for off-chain resolution (mainnet betting).

instructions.name: advance_turn
docs: Advance to next turn after a resolved turn.
Permissionless keeper call.

instructions.name: callback_matchup_seed
docs: Callback from MagicBlock VRF oracle with matchup randomness.
Only the VRF oracle (VRF_PROGRAM_IDENTITY signer) can call this.
Stores the randomness in RumbleCombatState.vrf_seed for fair pairing.

accounts.name: vrf_program_identity
docs: The VRF program identity — only the oracle can call this

instructions.name: claim_payout
docs: Bettor claims their payout if their fighter placed 1st (winner-takes-all).
Payout logic:
1. Sum all pools for fighters that did NOT place 1st = losers_pool
2. Treasury cut = 10% of losers_pool
3. Distributable = losers_pool - treasury_cut
4. 1st place bettors split 100% of distributable (winner-takes-all)
5. Each winning bettor gets their original bet back + proportional share

instructions.name: claim_sponsorship_revenue
docs: Fighter owner claims accumulated sponsorship revenue.
Drains the sponsorship PDA balance to the fighter owner.

accounts.name: fighter
docs: by reading bytes 8..40 (the authority pubkey after Anchor's 8-byte discriminator).

instructions.name: close_combat_state
docs: Close a RumbleCombatState PDA to reclaim rent. Admin-only.
Requires the associated rumble is Complete.

instructions.name: close_move_commitment
docs: Close a MoveCommitment PDA and return rent to a destination.
Admin-only. Only allowed when rumble is in Payout or Complete state.

instructions.name: close_rumble
docs: Close a completed Rumble PDA to reclaim rent. Admin-only.
Requires Complete state and claim window expired.

instructions.name: commit_combat
docs: Commit combat state from ER back to Solana L1 (periodic sync for spectators).

instructions.name: commit_move
docs: Fighter commits a move hash for the active rumble turn.
Hash format: sha256("rumble:v1", rumble_id, turn, fighter_pubkey, move_code, salt)

instructions.name: complete_rumble
docs: Admin transitions rumble to Complete state after all payouts processed.

instructions.name: create_rumble
docs: Create a new rumble with a list of fighters and an on-chain betting close slot.
`betting_deadline` is interpreted as a slot number for backward compatibility.

instructions.name: delegate_combat
docs: Delegate a combat state PDA to a MagicBlock Ephemeral Rollup.
Admin-only. Called after matchmaking, before combat starts on ER.

instructions.name: finalize_rumble
docs: Permissionless deterministic finalization from on-chain combat state.

instructions.name: initialize
docs: Initialize the rumble engine configuration.
Sets the admin key and treasury address.

instructions.name: open_turn
docs: Open the first turn window after combat starts.
Permissionless keeper call; correctness is slot-gated on-chain.

instructions.name: place_bet
docs: Place a bet on a fighter in a rumble.
Transfers SOL from bettor to vault, deducting admin fee and sponsorship.

accounts.name: vault
docs: Vault PDA that holds all bet SOL for this rumble.

accounts.name: sponsorship_account
docs: Sponsorship account PDA for the fighter being bet on.

instructions.name: post_turn_result
docs: Accept pre-computed turn results from the admin/keeper.
Validates damage by re-running resolve_duel internally.
This is the "Option D hybrid" path — combat math runs off-chain,
but on-chain program validates correctness.

instructions.name: report_result
docs: Deprecated: result is now finalized permissionlessly from on-chain combat state.

instructions.name: request_matchup_seed
docs: Request provably-fair matchup seed via MagicBlock VRF.
Admin calls this after combat starts to get a VRF-derived seed
for fair fighter pairing. The VRF oracle will automatically call
`callback_matchup_seed` with the randomness result.

instructions.name: resolve_turn
docs: Resolve the active turn from revealed move commitments.
If a fighter didn't reveal, deterministic fallback move is used.

instructions.name: reveal_move
docs: Fighter reveals move + salt for a previously committed move hash.

instructions.name: start_combat
docs: Transition rumble from Betting to Combat and initialize on-chain combat state.
Callable by admin after betting deadline.

instructions.name: sweep_treasury
docs: Sweep remaining SOL from a completed Rumble's vault to the treasury.
Called by admin after all claims are processed.

instructions.name: transfer_admin
docs: Propose a new admin (two-step transfer).
Creates/overwrites PendingAdminRE PDA. New admin must call accept_admin.

instructions.name: undelegate_combat
docs: Commit final combat state and undelegate back to Solana L1.

instructions.name: update_treasury
docs: Update the treasury address. Admin-only, immediate (lower risk than admin transfer).

errors.name: Unauthorized
errors.msg: Unauthorized: only admin can perform this action

errors.name: BettingClosed
errors.msg: Betting is closed for this rumble

errors.name: BettingNotEnded
errors.msg: Betting period has not ended yet

errors.name: InvalidFighterCount
errors.msg: Invalid fighter count: must be between 2 and 16

errors.name: ZeroBetAmount
errors.msg: Bet amount must be greater than zero

errors.name: DeadlineInPast
errors.msg: Betting deadline must be in the future

errors.name: ClaimWindowActive
errors.msg: Payout claim window is still active

errors.name: InvalidState
errors.msg: Invalid rumble state for this operation

errors.name: DamageMismatch
errors.msg: Posted damage does not match resolve_duel computation
